title: FreeCause, Inc.
summary: Affinity program between corporation and political committees to provide Internet toolbars. The Commission voted 2-0 on a motion to approve Agenda Doc. No. 08-05. The Commission was unable to render an opinion in this matter because the affirmative vote of 4 members of the Commission is required to render an advisory opinion. See 2 U.S.C. 437c(c) and 437d(a)(7); see also 11 CFR 112.4(a).
